sentence.Network_en: Candidates are urgently sought for the post of Conservative party chairman.
sentence.Network_cn: 保守党主席的职位急寻候选人。

sentence.Network_en: The woman prodded her neighbour and whispered urgently in his ear.
sentence.Network_cn: 那位女士捅了捅邻座，急切地在他耳边低语。

sentence.Network_en: Red Cross officials said they urgently needed bread and water.
sentence.Network_cn: 红十字会官员说他们急需面包和水。

entry.def: If something is urgent, it needs to be dealt with as soon as possible.

example.ex: There is an urgent need for food and water...
He had urgent business in New York.

entry.def: If you speak in an urgent way, you show that you are anxious for people to notice something or to do something.

example.ex: His voice was low and urgent...
His mother leaned forward and spoke to him in urgent undertones.
example.tran: 他母亲身子前倾，小声而急切地跟他说话。

auth_sentence.content: Heathrow needs capacity urgently, according to Mr Budd.
auth_sentence.res_content: Heathrow needs capacity urgently, according to Mr Budd.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Heathrow needs capacity urgently, according to Mr Budd.

auth_sentence.content: Surviving farm animals urgently need food and medical care.
auth_sentence.res_content: Surviving farm animals urgently need food and medical care.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Surviving farm animals urgently need food and medical care.

auth_sentence.content: This must be done urgently with a strangulated hernia.
auth_sentence.res_content: This must be done urgently with a strangulated hernia.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This must be done urgently with a strangulated hernia.

Sentence.sentence: Practical skills urgently needed in current society.

sentences.en: All of our hospitals are bursting at the seams; we have to build new ones urgently.
sentences.cn: 所有的医院都人满为患,我们迫切需要建几所新的。

sentences.en: He urgently begged a favour of me.
sentences.cn: 他急切地恳求我帮他一个忙。

sentences.en: Legislation on this issue is urgently needed.
“Do you see it?” he demanded urgently.
